description: A Square is a transportation space for unrestricted movement for vehicles, bicycles and/or pedestrians. This includes plazas as well as large sealed surfaces such as parking lots.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Square.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Square.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Square.
